text: Soekarno–Hatta International Airport () , abbreviated SHIA, is an airport in Indonesia. It is one of two airports in the Greater Jakarta area and serves international flights. ==Airlines and destinations== ===Passenger terminals=== {{Airport destination list | AirAsia | Kota Kinabalu, Kuala Lumpur |3 | Air China | Beijing-Capital, Xiamen| 2E | Airfast Indonesia | Surabaya, Timika | 1C | Air France | Paris-Charles de Gaulle, Singapore | 2E | | Tokyo-Haneda, Tokyo-Narita | 2D | Asiana Airlines |Seoul-Incheon| 2D | Aviastar (Indonesia) |Ketapang, Lubuklinggau| 1C |Batik Air|Ambon, Balikpapan, Denpasar, Jayapura, Kupang, Manado, Makassar, Pekanbaru, Surabaya, Yogyakarta |3 | Business Air | Bangkok-Don Mueang September 2014 Scedule. 9 September 2014.
